level.heading: Vesting under previous District of Columbia retirement program.
level.text: For purposes of vesting pursuant to ยง 1-626.10(b), creditable service with the District for employees whose participation in the District Defined Contribution Plan ceases as a result of the implementation of the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 shall include:
continuous service performed by nonjudicial employees of the District of Columbia courts after September 30, 1997; and

service performed for a successor employer, including the Department of Justice or the District of Columbia Offender Supervision, Defender, and Courts Services Agency established under ยง 24-133, that provides services previously performed by the District government.
